name: Damon the Merchant
description:
Made for Godot Wild Jam 29.

Use WASD to move around. Collect resources from planets, and sell them for coin. Earn enough coin to release your family from their captor!

Be careful how many resources you extract from a planet. If you extract too much, the planet will no longer regenerate!

Source code: https://github.com/nwforrer/Godot-Wild-29

Made with:

Engine: Godot 3.2.3

Art: Aseprite

Sound Effects: sfxr

Music: beepbox.co
